templates.name: VC BUG TEMPLATE
templates.text:
*Environment:*
 <TI>Enter where the issue is happening: Production, Dev or Staging</TI>*

*Steps to Reproduce:*
# <TI>Enter 1st detailed step to reproduce here.</TI>
# <TI>Enter 2nd detailed step to reproduce here.</TI>
# <TI>Enter 3rd detailed step to reproduce here.</TI>
# <TI>Enter detailed steps to reproduce here.</TI>

*Actual Result:*
<TI>Enter what is happening here.</TI>

*Expected Result:*
<TI>Enter what should happen here.</TI>

*Additional Information:*
* <TI>Enter any other helpful info/details such as other examples</TI>
* <TI>or named Screenshoots & Videos</TI>
* <TI>or link to #Bug-and-Features slack channel</TI>
* <TI>or Links to requirements, etc</TI>

*Workaround:*
<TI>If there is a way to work around the problem, place that information here.</TI>

templates.name: VC STORY TEMPLATE
templates.text:
*Scope:*
<TI>Enter High level goal</TI>

{panel:title=Story|titleBGColor=#F7D6C1|bgColor=#FFFFCE}

*As a* <TI>type of user/persona</TI>,
*I want* <TI>to perform some task</TI>,
*so that I can* <TI>achieve some goal/benefit/value</TI>

{panel}

*Out of Scope:*<TI>Specify if sth needs to be OoS</TI>

*User Experience*
<TI>Enter Design modals, user journeys, or any related information here</TI>

*Acceptance Criteria*
||AC_number||GIVEN||WHEN||THEN||
|AC-01|<TI>enter condition</TI>| <TI>enter trigger</TI>|<TI>enter output</TI>|
|AC-02|<TI>condition</TI>|<TI>trigger</TI>|<TI>output</TI>|
|AC-03|<TI>condition</TI>|<TI>trigger</TI>|<TI>output</TI>|

*Workaround:*
<TI>Enter any details, clarifications or points about implementation here.</TI>

*(i) Additional Information:*
<TI>Enter references or info that may help with developing the feature.</TI>

*(?) Q&A to resolve:*
* BETA Flag: choose (/) or (x)
* Release Strategy:choose (/) or (x)
<TI>if apply enter the relevant the link to release strategy</TI>
* External Dependencies: choose (/) or (x)
<TI>if there are dependencies link them</TI>

templates.name: VC TASK TEMPLATE
templates.text:
*What we need:*
<TI>enter What we need to do</TI>*

*Why/What for:*
<TI>enter For What/Why we need to do</TI>

*How do that:*
<TI>general How we need to do</TI>


*Acceptance Criteria*
||AC_number||GIVEN||WHEN||THEN||
|AC-01|<TI>enter condition</TI>| <TI>enter trigger</TI>|<TI>enter output</TI>|
|AC-02|<TI>condition</TI>|<TI>trigger</TI>|<TI>output</TI>|

templates.name: VC EPIC TEMPLATE
templates.text:
*Epic Name:*
 <TI>Enter what is going to be the Epic Link for the stories/tasks attached to it</TI>

 *Epic info*:*
 <TI>Enter a general idea about what the Epic is about</TI>

templates.name: VC SUB TASK TEMPLATE
templates.text:
*What we need:*
<TI>enter What we need to do</TI>*

*Why/What for:*
<TI>enter For What/Why we need to do</TI>

*How do that:*
<TI>general How we need to do</TI>


*Solution:*
<TI>Enter info/details of the solution given, e.g: event tracking naming, decided final structure... </TI>
